events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident that occurred on April 30, 2024, involving rear-end collision at a traffic light.
Initial review classified the claim under Auto Accident category due to the involvement of a vehicle collision.
Agent Maria Thompson was assigned to handle the claim and will provide support throughout the process.
Acknowledgment was sent to the claimant confirming receipt of the accident claim and outlining next steps.
Requested copies of the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills related to the accident.
Claimant submitted all requested documents including police report and photographs of the damaged car.
Investigator assigned to verify the details of the collision and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation confirmed the claimant was not at fault and damage estimates were consistent with the report.
A settlement offer was prepared, covering the repair costs and associated medical expenses for the claimant.
The claimant responded thanking the company for prompt processing and clear communication throughout.
The claim was officially approved for the proposed settlement amount without any disputes.
Payment was processed and sent to the claimantâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repairs and medical costs.
The auto accident claim was closed after final payment, with all parties satisfied with the resolution.
